Package Controllers

Class FeatureTypeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.MainController
      • Controllers.FeatureTypeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FeatureTypeController
extends MainController
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Action listener for the featureType JComboBox in a FeaturePanelSimple. It triggers a change in the distanceMetric JComboBox in the same panel, whenever the featureType box is changed
    Version:
    Milestone 4
    Author:
    Gabrielle
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
